entities.name: neville
entities.description: Neville is mentioned as a student who has poor memory and gets his foot stuck in a step on the staircase.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as one of Neville's friends who helps pull him out of the staircase.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Neville's friends who helps pull him out of the staircase and talks to a suit of armor.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: Hogwarts is mentioned as the school where Neville, Harry, and Ron are students.

relationships.description: Harry helps pull Neville out of the staircase.
Ron helps pull Neville out of the staircase.
Neville is helped by Harry when he gets his foot stuck in a step on the staircase.
Neville is helped by Ron when he gets his foot stuck in a step on the staircase.
Harry and Neville head together to Gryffindor Tower.
Ron and Neville head together to Gryffindor Tower.
Neville heads with Harry and Ron to Gryffindor Tower.
